media:group.media:title: The Cult of Thierry Tilly (1/5)
media:group.media:description:
In the early 2000s, an aristocratic French family secluded themselves inside of their mansion believing that Freemasons wanted to kill them. Over the course of ten years, they handed their fortune away to a con-artist who promised to protect them named Thierry Tilly.

Part Two: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=evDUGPvcX-E
